root.name: Luminous Arc
root.description: Luminous Arc, released in 2007 in NA, was Imageepoch's first mainstream success and already spawned a sequel. The story revolves around Alph and his friends, who have been trained since young by the Arc Knight Heath to be a force of witch-slaying soldiers operating for the Church of Luminous in anticipation of the rebirth of witches into the world. Players take command of the group in a similar fashion to games such as Final Fantasy Tactics's battle system. Gameplay is similar to most turn-based strategy games currently released and can be controlled either with the stylus or the d-pad and other buttons. There are also gameplay elements unique to the game that add more depth to the gameplay such as Flash Drives, which are special attacks performed by each character.
